law.catch_line: Statement of change of principal office.

text.section:
An entity required in its organizational filing to identify its principal office or a foreign entity qualified to transact business that changes the mailing address of its principal office shall deliver to the Secretary of State for filing, on a form supplied by the Secretary of State, a statement of change that sets forth:
The name of the entity or foreign entity;
The address of its principal office prior to the change; and
The new principal office address.
Subsection (1) of this section shall apply to a statement of registration as a limited liability partnership filed pursuant to KRS 382.335 or statements filed pursuant to KRS Chapter 362.1.
Subsection (1) of this section shall apply to a change in the designated office of a limited partnership.

law.history: Created 2010 Ky. Acts ch. 151, sec. 33, effective January 1, 2011.
